scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Seiza ni Naretara' continues with Nekomata Okayu, Yozora Mel, Aki Rosenthal, and Ayunda Risu.
Stage transition and performance of 'Dai Zero Kan' by Mori Calliope, Hakos Baelz, and Tsunomaki Watame.

subtitles.original: 離れたところから
subtitles.english: From a distant place

subtitles.original: あんなに輝く
subtitles.english: It shines so brightly

subtitles.original: いいな 君は みんなから愛されて
subtitles.english: How nice, you're loved by everyone

subtitles.original: いいや 僕は ずっと一人きりさ
subtitles.english: No, I've always been all alone

subtitles.original: ずっと一人きりさ
subtitles.english: Always all alone

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 星降る夜 一瞬の願い事
subtitles.english: A night of falling stars, a momentary wish

subtitles.original: 煌めいて 揺らめいて
subtitles.english: Sparkling, swaying

subtitles.original: 震えてるシグナル
subtitles.english: A trembling signal

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 空見上げて指を差されるような
subtitles.english: Like being pointed at while looking up at the sky

subtitles.original: 繋いだ線 解かないで
subtitles.english: Don't untie the line we connected

subtitles.original: 僕がどんなに眩しくても
subtitles.english: No matter how bright I am

subtitles.original: もうすぐ時計は８時
subtitles.english: The clock is almost at 8:00

subtitles.original: 夜空に満天の星
subtitles.english: A night sky full of stars

subtitles.original: 何処の根 離れたところにはもう
subtitles.english: In a place far from its roots

subtitles.original: ないかもしれない
subtitles.english: It might not be there anymore

subtitles.original: 月が綺麗で泣きそうになるのは
subtitles.english: The reason I feel like crying because the moon is beautiful

subtitles.original: 泣きそうになるのは
subtitles.english: I feel like crying

subtitles.original: いつの日にか 別れが来るから
subtitles.english: Is because one day, a parting will come

subtitles.original: 別れが来るから
subtitles.english: A parting will come

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 彗星みたいに流れる独り言
subtitles.english: A soliloquy that flows like a comet

subtitles.original: 消えたいく 残像は
subtitles.english: The vanishing afterimage is

subtitles.original: 真夜中のプリズム
subtitles.english: A midnight prism

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 切なる願い 誰かに届いたら
subtitles.english: If my earnest wish reaches someone

subtitles.original: 変われるかな 夜の淵を
subtitles.english: Could I change? Along the edge of night

subtitles.original: なぞるような こんな僕でも
subtitles.english: Tracing it, even someone like me

subtitles.original: 遥か彼方 僕らは出会ってしまった
subtitles.english: In the far distance, we happened to meet

subtitles.original: カルマだから 何度も出会ってしまうよ
subtitles.english: Because it's karma, we'll keep meeting again and again

subtitles.original: 雲の隙間で
subtitles.english: Through the gaps in the clouds

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 夜 広げて描こう 絵空事
subtitles.english: Let's spread the night and draw an idle dream

subtitles.original: 暗闇を 照らすような
subtitles.english: Like lighting up the darkness

subtitles.original: 満月じゃなくても
subtitles.english: Even if it's not a full moon

subtitles.original: だから集まって星座になりたい
subtitles.english: So I want to gather and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 色とりどりの光 放つような
subtitles.english: Like emitting multi-colored light

subtitles.original: 繋いだ線 解かないよ
subtitles.english: I won't untie the line we connected

subtitles.original: 君がどんなに眩しくても
subtitles.english: No matter how bright you are

subtitles.original: 第ゼロ感
subtitles.english: Dai Zero Kan

subtitles.original: 群れをはぐれて 夢をくわえた
subtitles.english: Wandered away from the pack, clutching a dream

subtitles.original: それが最後になる気がしたんだ
subtitles.english: I felt like that would be the last time

subtitles.original: それが最後になる気がしたんだ
subtitles.english: I felt like that would be the last time

subtitles.original: 獣は砂を一握り撒いた
subtitles.english: The beast scattered a handful of sand

subtitles.original: それが最後になる気がしたんだ
subtitles.english: I felt like that would be the last time

subtitles.original: それが最後になる気がしたんだ
subtitles.english: I felt like that would be the last time

subtitles.original: 不確かな夢叶えるのさ
subtitles.english: I'll make uncertain dreams come true

subtitles.original: 約束の夜に
subtitles.english: On the promised night

subtitles.original: 微かな風にうねるのさ
subtitles.english: Swaying in a faint breeze

subtitles.original: 静寂の朝に
subtitles.english: On the silent morning

subtitles.original: 遠い星の少年は
subtitles.english: The boy from a distant star

subtitles.original: その腕に約束の飾り
subtitles.english: Has the ornament of a promise on his arm

subtitles.original: まだ旅路の最中さ
subtitles.english: Still in the middle of a journey

subtitles.original: 幻惑の園に
subtitles.english: In the garden of illusion
